commandDescription: Validates alignment between XML and CSV representations of translations using string comparison or logic comparison
inputFlagDescription: Comma-separated list of translation names to validate (without extension). If not specified, all translations will be validated
modeFlagDescription: Validation mode: 'string' for full string comparison, 'logic' for in-memory structure comparison (default: %s)
validationSummary: Validation Summary: %s translations validated, %s aligned, %s misaligned
